notes.title: Funding
notes.p: EK is recipient of a scholarship from the Government of the United Republic of Tanzania through the World Bank (WB-ACE II Grant PAD1436) to the SACIDS Africa Centre of Excellence for Infectious Diseases of Humans and Animals in East and Southern Africa (SACIDS-ACE) at the SACIDS Foundation for One Health of the Sokoine University of Agriculture, Morogoro, Tanzania.
